required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Apatinib Combined With SHR-1210 Injection in the Treatment of Patients With Removable IB-IIIA NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: One-arm Exploratory Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Apatinib Combined With SHR-1210 Injection (PD-1 Antibody) in the Treatment of Removable IB-IIIA Non-small Cell Lung Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study was to investigate the safety and efficacy of SHR-1210 in combination with the anti-vascular survival target drug apatinib in patients with resectable NSCLC, and to provide new treatment options for neoadjuvant therapy in patients with the period IB-IIIA NSCLC.

primary_outcome.measure: Major pathologic response rate(MPR)(<10% viable tumor cells)
primary_outcome.description: To assess the major pathologic response rate (<10% viable tumor cells) in patients receiving Apatinib Combined With SHR-1210 Injection.

secondary_outcome.description: the proportion of patients with a best overall response of CR, PR or SD in the whole body, as assessed per RECIST 1.1 by the investigator.
the proportion of patients with a best overall confirmed response of CR or PR in the whole body as assessed per RECIST 1.1 by the investigator
Defined as the time from date of surgery until recurrence of tumor or death from any cause

other_outcome.description: Grade 3 or higher per Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE V5.0)
Grade 3 or higher per Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE V5.0)

arm_group.description: Drugs:Apatinib Apatinib mesylate tablets 250 mg qd po, discontinued one week before surgery. Drugs: SHR-1210 SHR-1210 injection 200mg (5mL), ivgtt, q2w, 3 cycles, each time 20-60min completed infusion. Surgery: The patient underwent imaging examinations within 7 days prior to surgery, including chest CT and related metastatic examinations. The patient underwent surgery 7-8 weeks after the first dose.

overall_official.affiliation: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute
